successes.title: HEXO+: Your Autonomous Aerial Camera - Drone
successes.description: HEXO+ is an intelligent drone that follows and films you autonomously. Aerial filming for everyone.

Pledges.description: WALL OF FAME: Join our wild ride and help us take aerial filming to the next level! You will receive project updates and will be front and center on our Wall of Fame on hexoplus.com.

FOUNDERS CLUB: Welcome to the club! As a founder you will receive a personalized thank you video from Xavier and the team that will make you the envy of your friends. On top of that, you will get all project updates and a warm spot on our Wall of Fame on hexoplus.com.

THE DIY KIT: Like to go DIY on your drone? You get 3D files to print your drone, the components list, our autonomous flight controller, the Hexo+ app and a how-to tutorial. If you’re already in expert mode, you can even fit our controller in your own drone.
Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FLY (GOPRO OWNER):  Already own a GoPro and want to let it fly? You get a complete Hexo+ drone, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with GoPro mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. All this for close to half of the $899 planned retail price.
Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FLY (GOPRO OWNER): Already own a GoPro and want to let it fly? You get a complete Hexo+ drone, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with GoPro mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. All this for the ridiculous amount of $599, instead of the $899 planned retail price. 
Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FLY 360CAM: Together with Giroptic’s 360cam we bring you aerial 360° photo and video capability. You get a complete Hexo+ drone, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with 360cam mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FLY FOR 360CAM AND GOPRO: Together with Giroptic’s 360cam we bring you aerial 360° photo and video capability. You get a complete Hexo+ drone, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with 360cam mount, another one with GoPro mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FILM: The complete pack, aerial filming out of the box: you get a complete Hexo+ drone, a GoPro Hero3 White Edition HD camera, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with GoPro mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. All this for almost half of the $1099 planned retail price.
Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.

READY TO FILM: The complete pack, aerial filming out of the box: a complete Hexo+ drone, a GoPro Hero3 White Edition HD camera, a stabilizing 2D gimbal with GoPro mount and our Hexo+ app to set up your shoots. All this for the ridiculous amount of $799, instead of the $1099 planned retail price. 
Shipping to US, Canada, Europe and Australia only.
